title: How to Make Homemade Disinfectant

steps.headline: Pour the hot water into a suitable container for mixing.
Add the pure soap and stir through.
Add the vinegar and borax and stir.
Pour into a suitable container (such as a clean spray bottle).
steps.description: Be sure to label it so that everyone is aware of what it is and its purpose. A date can also help.

steps.headline: Use to disinfect areas such as kitchen countertops, bathrooms, etc.
steps.description: It can be wiped on or sprayed onto surfaces as preferred.

text: Pour the hot water into a suitable container for mixing.  Add the pure soap and stir through.  Add the vinegar and borax and stir.  Pour into a suitable container (such as a clean spray bottle). Be sure to label it so that everyone is aware of what it is and its purpose. A date can also help. Use to disinfect areas such as kitchen countertops, bathrooms, etc. It can be wiped on or sprayed onto surfaces as preferred.
